0: We stayed 10 days and enjoyed every minute no complaints at all
This time we did not expect another upgrade but the room we were allocated was far from perfect
Our room was a little smaller than we expected and the bathtub made some loud noice when it was filled with water
I was looking after 3 kids by myself and the waiter told me to go and get my own food
My experiences at the Shanghai La in Sydney have always been great but the hotel in Singapore was terrible
The hotel is good but there are some negative things
No good will offered came away feeling poor overall customer experience and unlikely to promote the hotel back to Shell
We have been visiting Singapore for several years and have stayed in various 5 star hotels
Also in general the incidental prices are unreasonably expensive
Please get a taster to check out the curry chicken and improve it
1: Breakfast was also amazing and there is a large variety to choose from all freshly prepared for you
I especially liked being able to sit outside for breakfast
Also Jesie is a very nice lady
I will defenitely come again with my friends and family
Fabulous hotel staff to match marvellous experience
Kudos to staff member Aoi Andrea and Shoban for the great service
Every time we come over the the Shangri La Valley wing in Singapore it Always a great experience of feeling welcomed taken care of
Friendly helpful and warm staff cleanliness and facilities at the hotel were up to standard or I should say better than expected
